name: technitium
description: Technitium DNS Server is a self-hosted, privacy-focused authoritative and recursive DNS server. It offers DNS-over-HTTPS/TLS, blocking, logging, and a comprehensive web management console for home and enterprise networks.
features: Authoritative DNS: Host your own domains with full zone management and record type support.
Recursive resolver: Provide DNS resolution for your network with caching for improved performance.
DNS-over-HTTPS: Secure DNS queries using DoH protocol to prevent eavesdropping and manipulation.
DNS-over-TLS: Encrypt DNS traffic with DoT for privacy-focused resolution on compatible clients.
Ad blocking: Block ads and trackers at the DNS level using customizable blocklists and allow lists.
Query logging: Log all DNS queries for troubleshooting, security analysis, and network monitoring.
DNSSEC validation: Validate DNSSEC signatures to ensure DNS responses haven't been tampered with.
Conditional forwarding: Forward specific domains to designated DNS servers for split-horizon setups.
Web console: Manage all DNS settings through an intuitive web-based administration interface.
Zone transfer: Support AXFR and IXFR zone transfers for secondary DNS server configurations.
Dynamic updates: Allow authorized clients to update DNS records dynamically for DHCP integration.
Statistics dashboard: Monitor query statistics, top domains, and server performance metrics in real-time.
